required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: En_Línea. An Online Treatment to Change Lifestyle in Overweight and Obesity
clinical_study.official_title: En_Línea. An Online Treatment to Change Lifestyle in Overweight and Obesity: Study Protocol for a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized controlled trial to test the effectiveness of an online weight control program, called en_línea, comparing with a standard group therapy and a control group

detailed_description.textblock: This is a randomized controlled trial with three intervention arms: en_línea, standard group therapy and control group. To perform this study, 305 adults (18-65 years) with overweight type II (27-29.9 kg/m2) or obesity type I (30-34.9 kg/m2) will be invited to participate. Interventions will last 17 weeks with follow-ups 1, 3, 6 and 12 months after the post-treatment appointment. The primary outcome will be post-treatment weight loss and the maintenance during the follow-ups. Secondary outcomes will be adherence rates, drop outs and quality of life. Participants will be assessed before randomization and they will be sign an inform consent.

primary_outcome.description: 5%-10% of weight loss respect the initial weight

primary_outcome.measure: Maintenance of weight loss 1 month follow-up
Maintenance of weight loss 3 months follow-up
Maintenance of weight loss 6 months follow-up
Maintenance of weight loss 12 months follow-up

secondary_outcome.description: 80% of completed website activities and 80% of self-records
Percentage of participants who finish the treatment
Questionnaire of Quality of Life provided by the LEARN program

arm_group.description: Participants will be provided with a username and a password to acess to a website. en_línea program is an online adaptation of the LEARN program. The five treatment areas are: Lifestyle, Exercise, Attitudes, Relationships and Nutrition. We have designed and developed a website (www.programaenlinea.org) with 17 weekly treatment sessions and an exclusive mobile application for self-recording.

Participants in this arm will received a 10 sessions of standard primary care group therapy. Sessions 1 and 2 will be weekly and sessions from 3 to 10 will be biweekly. Sessions, between 8 and 10 participants, will be conducted by a specialized psychologist and they will last 90 minutes. Treatment areas will be the same as en_línea, beginning with nutrition and exercise and a progressive incorporation of the other topics. Material to work at home and self-recording will be provided in paper.

Participants in the control group only will receive a biweekly newsletter by email without feedback. They will be provided with material and instructions to self-record their daily meals and exercise. The newsletter only will content basic information about nutrition and exercise.

intervention.description: This is an online adaptation of the LEARN program. A self-help weight control program developed by Kelly Brownell in 2004.
This is a traditional behavioral weight control program

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Overweight type II or obesity type I. BMI between 27 and 34.9 kg/m2
2. Age between 18 and 65 years old
3. Compliance with all evaluation phases.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Presence of several physical disease, i.e. diabetes, hypertension, cancer or metabolic disorders
2. Presence of several psychological problem, i.e. depression, anxiety
3. Presence of other eating disorders, i.e. anorexia nervosa, bulimia nervosa, binge eating disorders
4. Use of drugs, i.e. slimming, anovulatory or psychotropic
5. Pregnancy or planned pregnancy for the next six months
6. Following another weight control program at the time of selection.

facility.name: Unidad de Terapia de Conducta, University of Barcelona

patient_data.ipd_description: Research team have to meet and make a decision about this field
